@wholisticguy @Jstodd_ @MuteDialog It‚Äôs really simple and there are no huge assumptions. Ether becomes too deflationary: Less incentive to use it as intended, more incentive to just hold. Less usage = less demand. Less demand = less burn. Less burn = less deflation.

@wholisticguy @Jstodd_ @MuteDialog What are you on about? Minimum viable issuance is Ethereums policy. 1559 has self-regulating properties. If the deflation gets strong enough to impact people using the chain, it will go down again because the burn is proportionally to the usage of the network.
